FuncDef: The display cfm md command displays information about an MD, including the name and level of the MD.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MD. If md-name is not specified, information about all MDs created on the device is displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters. Question marks (?) are not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can use the display cfm md command to view information about MDs, such as the MD level, MD name format, MIP generation rule in the MD, and sender ID TLV type. In addition, you can view brief information about the MAs in the MD, such as the MA name, interval between sending CCMs, ID of the VLAN associated with the MA, and name of the VSI associated with the MA. If md-name parameter is not specified, information about all created MDs is displayed.
